Read In data.
--

```{r}
sample<- read.csv("sample_health_facilities.csv")
df <-read.csv("lgas.csv")
```
Select out southern zone datapoints.
```{r}
south <- subset (sample, zone %in% c("Southeast","Southwest","South-South"))
```
Incoporate pup_2006
```{r}
dfmerge <- merge (south,df[c("lga_id", "pop_2006")], by="lga_id")
```
filter useful fields
```{r}
dfquery <- dfmerge[c("state", "num_nurses_fulltime", "num_doctors_fulltime", "pop_2006")]
```
Count and sort result.
```{r}
dfcount <- aggregate(. ~ state, data=dfquery, FUN=sum)
result <- dfcount[order(-dfcount$pop_2006),]
result
```
